reviewText: This DVD does exactly what it says and is beautifully presented.  We used it as a Christmas gift for a young man who is considering architecture as a career and he was very impressed, as were we.
Prior to seeing this DVD I was not aware of the variety of religious architecture that FLW had undertaken, in addition to his other more famous or well-known buildings.  Highly recommended.

I learned a lot about the churches designed by Wright.  The coverage of each church is pretty complete without going on too long.  Great images in all lights.  Now I need to go see all of these places!
